Class XmlDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.shyrei.rentshop.dao.impl.XmlDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRentShopDAO

    public class XmlDAOImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRentShopDAO
    The implementation class of the DAO interface. In this class, basic methods for working with DAO and the main logic of the program are implemented.
    Author:
    Shyrei Uladzimir
